text: He said that the agreement was presented to the Parliament today and got the approval but, the Joint Opposition fled without joining the debate held at the Parliament today.He further added that they didnt join the debate as they had nothing to say about the agreement.The Concession Agreement on Hambantota Port with the China Merchants Port Holdings Company would be signed tomorrow (29th July), Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe said today in Colombo. He said that the agreement was presented to the Parliament today and got the approval but, the Joint Opposition fled without joining the debate held at the Parliament today.He further added that they didnt join the debate as they had nothing to say about the agreement.
title: Concession Agreement on Hambantota Port signs tomorrow
